'''''Full Speed Ahead''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in various places in [[Teyvat]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Reach the destination within the time limit. Defeating opponents will extend your remaining time slightly.}}
#Reach the destination within the time limit (0/1).
#*Additional time will be gained after each kill.

==Gameplay Notes==
*Stand on the [[Pressure Plate]] to start the challenge.
*Some versions will have [[Wind Currents]] and [[Anemo Ring]]s. Some Inazuma variants will have [[Thunder Sphere]]s and [[Electrograna]].
*Like [[Straight to the Heart]], some versions of this commission will not require any enemies to be killed if fast enough. The slimes are also weaker.

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}
